workflow_sequence.description: Employee onboarding (2025-07-10); HR offers consent for workplace PEEP; employee consents.
Fire safety advisor conducts PCFRA (in-person, with BSL interpreter) on 2025-07-10; functional capability assessed; Access to Work report reviewed.
Employer installs visual alarm beacons at workstation and high-contrast tactile wayfinding along evacuation routes (completed 2025-07-18).
PEEP created on 2025-07-15; buddy system assigned (Alex Chen as primary buddy); approved and effective from 2025-07-20.
6-month review conducted on 2026-01-15; employee moved to Floor 5 (role change); PEEP amended; new PEEP (v2.0) created; previous PEEP superseded.

equality_act_2010.sec_20_reasonable_adjustments: Visual alarm beacons installed; high-contrast tactile wayfinding installed; buddy system assigned; BSL interpreter provided for training/drills

notes: This bundle demonstrates a workplace PEEP for an employee with sensory impairments (profound hearing loss and low vision). The employer has implemented reasonable adjustments under the Equality Act 2010: visual alarm beacons, high-contrast tactile wayfinding, and a buddy system. The PEEP was reviewed at 6 months (rather than annually) due to a role change. The review resulted in an amended PEEP for the new floor location with a new buddy assignment. This demonstrates responsive review cycles triggered by change of circumstance.
